title.en: Anguished Prayer to the Buddhas and Bodhisattvas

text.en: Namo guru!
text.en-trans: namo guru

text.en: Peerless guru, the Lord of Sages,
text.en-trans: lama nyammé tubpé wangpo dang

text.en: Mañjughoṣa, Maitreya, Vajrapāṇi, Avalokiteśvara and the rest,
text.en-trans: jamyang jampa chakdor chenzik sok

text.en: Possessors of great, non-referential compassion,
text.en-trans: mikmé tukjé chenpo dang denpé

text.en: Victors and your heirs, turn your attention towards me.
text.en-trans: gyal dang dé sé tsok nam gong su sol

text.en: Kyema! Sentient beings like me possess such evil karma.
text.en-trans: kyema dak dré semchen lé ngenpa

text.en: Our bodies are racked by various forms of illness,
text.en-trans: lü la natsok né kyi dungwé nar

text.en: Our speech is like a treasury of the non-virtuous,
text.en-trans: ngak ni mi gé ter gyi jungné gyur

text.en: Our minds are drowsy, dull, torpid and forgetful.
text.en-trans: sem la jing muk nyi dang jengé ché

text.en: May the victorious ones and their heirs
text.en-trans: go sum trulpé rangzhin dindra bé

text.en: Look with great compassion upon the deluded nature of our three doors,
text.en-trans: né ngen len la sé ché gyalwa yi

text.en: And their tendencies which lead to states of misery.
text.en-trans: tukjé chenpö ngepar zik su sol

text.en: I know a little of what to adopt and to avoid,
text.en-trans: dak ni langdor chungzé shé na ang

text.en: But my vigilance is as if intoxicated by the kleśas,
text.en-trans: shezhin nyönmong chang gi rab nyöpé

text.en: And I am helpless—O buddhas and bodhisattvas,
text.en-trans: wangmé gyurpé kyé ngen daknyi la

text.en: Protect me, I pray, wretched as I am.
text.en-trans: gyalsé nam kyi kyobpar dzé du sol

text.en: Stop the process of karma and the kleśas
text.en-trans: lé nyön trulkhor drakpo dokpa dang

text.en: And dispel the dense darkness of saṃsāra!
text.en-trans: khorwé münpa mukpo sal du sol

text.en: Open the way to light through your wisdom rays,
text.en-trans: yeshe zer gyi nangwé go ché la

text.en: And reveal to me, I pray, the undeluded state,
text.en-trans: ma trul neluk zabmo dé khoné

text.en: The profound nature of reality, exactly as it is.
text.en-trans: rangzhin ngöngyur dak la dzé du sol

text.en: Kyema Kyihü! O compassionate conquerors,
text.en-trans: kyema kyihü gyalwa tukjé chen

text.en: Lead me from the mire of existence, here and now,
text.en-trans: danta nyi du sipé dam lé drong

text.en: And guide me along the path of supreme awakening.
text.en-trans: changchub chok gi lam la drong du sol

text.en: Cleanse and purify the stains of my obscurations,
text.en-trans: dribpé drima dak ching jangwa dang

text.en: Help me to experience the qualities of realization,
text.en-trans: tokpé yönten nyam ok chüpa dang

text.en: And cause me to attain the kingdom of the four kāyas!
text.en-trans: ku zhi gyalsa tobpar dzé du sol
